structure.unit: ARTICLE G. - PROBATIONARY RENTAL OCCUPANCY PERMIT [8]

law.text: Nothing in this article shall authorize or condone any violation of Federal, state, and City fair housing laws and state landlord and tenant laws. This article shall not diminish any private right of action of any person. (Ord. No. 2004-720, ยง1, 10-19-04) State law references: State Fair Housing Act, G.S. Ch. 41A; landlord and tenant, G.S. Ch. 42.
